Description

unit [IN] Unit number.
pol_cfg [IN] Policer config
policer_id [IN,OUT] Policer ID
Return values:
OPENNSL_E_XXX 
int opennsl_policer_destroy ( int  unit,
opennsl_policer_t  policer_id 
)

Destroy a policer entry.

Description
Destroy a policer entry. A policer entry has the following restrictions before it can be destroyed. 1. The Policer should be detached from all the entries 2. Detaching the policer from the entry does not clear the policer and meter entries from the hardware. So, the entry must be re-installed or removed before policer destroy.
Parameters:
unit [IN] Unit number.
policer_id [IN] Policer ID
Return values:
OPENNSL_E_XXX
